source.name: Chapter 1.1:8.1 - rephrase functionality

answers.answer: Allows the LLM to vary the wording of responses

source.learningObjectives: SWBAT identify the purpose of the rephrase parameter
source.guidance: The correct answer is 'Allows the LLM to vary the wording of responses'. When `rephrase: True` is set, it enables the LLM to modify and vary the wording of responses rather than providing exactly the same text each time. This makes conversations feel more natural and less repetitive.
